CustomObject.description: Defines a single Item to be used on lwcSEPToDoList with a count and redirect link. Items can be either a parent/aggregate or a child. Clicking on a parent/aggregate item should take you to a page with the same component displaying the parent's child records whose sum should equal the total of the parent.
CustomObject.label: Seller Portal To Do List Item
CustomObject.pluralLabel: Seller Portal To Do List Items
